price: Dan kami tidak menurunkan kepada kaumnya sesudah dia (meninggal) suatu pasukan pun dari langit dan tidak layak Kami menurunkannya.
arabic: ۞ وَمَآ أَنزَلۡنَا عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ مِن جُندٖ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا كُنَّا مُنزِلِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā anzalnā ʿalā qawmihi min baʿdihi min jundin mina al-samāi wamā kunnā munzilīna
